title: The Bad Guy
description: A Christmas Eve bank heist is a first for longtime friends Kevin, Teddy, Marco and Sergio. Knocking over gas stations and small stores was all they knew up until this point, but with higher risk comes a higher payout.When the robbery takes an unexpected turn, Kevin comes to a moral dilemma. To what lengths will he go? Is being a criminal a way of life or does it take something more to be considered evil? After years of indifference, he comes face to face with himself and discovers what it truly means to be a Bad Guy.You will claw through this fast-moving, dark psychological thriller as each chapter will keep you yearning for more.
author: Steven Cappetta
